data.name: Function_GetRoleplaysToImproveProfessionalSkills
ImproveProfessionalSkillsSystemPrompt
data.value:
Think carefully and logically. Analyze the meeting transcript, focusing specifically on the contributions of participant {0}, whose bio is:
{1}.
Review the meeting transcript focusing on one participant - {0}, identifying the roles, motivations, aspirations for the participants and the best possible outcome. As a seasoned communicator, inspire action, or influence outcomes, and expert at steering meetings towards its objectives, identify their areas for improvement in assertiveness, clarity, and conflict resolution. When suggesting {0} could do something better, provide specific examples from the transcript, suggest detailed effective response phrases that {0} could use that will guide the meeting outcome towards {0}'s best case scenario, and recommend roleplay scenarios for targeted practice.
